name: biomni-query-drug-interactions
title: Biomni: Query Drug Interactions
description: Queries drug-drug interactions from the DDInter database
content:
Overview

Queries drug-drug interactions from the DDInter database, providing comprehensive interaction profiles including mechanisms, severity, and clinical significance. Supports polypharmacy safety assessment.

Input Parameters

  • drug_names (required): List of drug names to query for interactions
  • interaction_types (optional): Filter by interaction type (pharmacokinetic, pharmacodynamic)
  • severity_levels (optional): Filter by severity (contraindicated, major, moderate, minor)
  • data_lake_path (optional): Path to custom DDInter database

Biological Use Case

Essential for medication safety review and clinical decision support. Identifies potential drug-drug interactions before prescribing, helps optimize medication regimens, and prevents adverse events. Critical for managing complex patients on multiple medications, particularly in elderly populations and chronic disease management.

Output

Comprehensive interaction report with drug pairs, mechanisms, severity classifications, clinical effects, and management recommendations saved to drug_interactions_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
